pr_title: Handle timeout units in doc/v1, and catch parse errors in handler

timeline.message: Handle timeout units in doc/v1, and catch parse errors in handler

timeline.bodyText:
What about us and ns ?
Don't we have som utility method for this ?
timeline.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: It doesn't need to be an integer, do I don't see the need for other units. The search handler recognises ms, and treats everything else as s. I think this is strictly better.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Actually, it recognise ks and µs as well, which is just obscene. I found the code, which is split out somewhere, but it's in the search module.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: May as well use that code, then.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: (It was already a dependency of this module.)
replies.author: jonmv
